con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> </xml-fragment>

con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:types> <s:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <s:element name="CheckTextRequest"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="text" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> <s:attribute name="lang" type="s:string"/> <s:attribute name="options" type="s:int" use="optional" default="0"/> <s:attribute name="format" type="s:string" use="optional" default=""/> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="CheckTextResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="SpellResult" type="tns:SpellResult"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="SpellResult"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="error" type="tns:SpellError"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="SpellError"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="word" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="s" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> <s:attribute name="code" type="s:int" use="required"/> <s:attribute name="pos" type="s:int" use="required"/> <s:attribute name="row" type="s:int" use="required"/> <s:attribute name="col" type="s:int" use="required"/> <s:attribute name="len" type="s:int" use="required"/> </s:complexType> <s:element name="CheckTextsRequest"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="text" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> <s:attribute name="lang" type="s:string"/> <s:attribute name="options" type="s:int" use="optional" default="0"/> <s:attribute name="format" type="s:string" use="optional" default=""/> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="CheckTextsResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="ArrayOfSpellResult" type="tns:ArrayOfSpellResult"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfSpellResult"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="SpellResult" type="tns:SpellResult"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="checkTextSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CheckTextRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="checkTextSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CheckTextResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="checkTextsSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CheckTextsRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="checkTextsSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CheckTextsResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SpellServiceSoap"> <wsdl:operation name="checkText"> <wsdl:input message="tns:checkTextSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:checkTextSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="checkTexts"> <wsdl:input message="tns:checkTextsSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:checkTextsSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="SpellServiceSoap" type="tns:SpellServiceSoap"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="checkText"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice/checkText" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="checkTexts"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice/checkTexts" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:binding name="SpellServiceSoap12" type="tns:SpellServiceSoap"> <soap12:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="checkText"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice/checkText" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="checkTexts"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice/checkTexts" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="SpellService"> <wsdl:port name="SpellServiceSoap" binding="tns:SpellServiceSoap"> <soap:address location="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"/> </wsdl:port> <wsdl:port name="SpellServiceSoap12" binding="tns:SpellServiceSoap12"> <soap12:address location="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="en" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>today isnot sunni wether</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="?" options="0" format="">\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>?</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="?" options="0" format="">\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>?</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: GetCorrectWord
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest>\r <spel:text>questionare</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: RecheckWord
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest>\r <spel:text>${Properties#Correct answer}</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script: import static java.util.Calendar.YEAR import java.util.Date TimeZone.setDefault(TimeZone.getTimeZone('UTC')) def now = new Date() def date = now.format("yyyy-MM-dd") dataTime = date + ' T00:00:00+03:00' log.info(dataTime) print(dataTime) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("DataTime", dataTime)

con:request.name: CheckDateFormat
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="En" options="6" format="">\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>${Project#DateTime} </spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>

con:config.script:
def numCases = context.testCase.getPropertyValue('numCases') as int numCases -= 1 context.testCase.setPropertyValue('numCases', "$numCases")
def dataMap = [ 'Ru, Uk':'малинькая дівчинк любит варіння', 'En, Uk':'маленька дівчинка любіт варіння is a litle girl likes jam' ] def keys = dataMap.keySet().collect() def lang = keys[numCases] def text = dataMap[lang] context.testCase.setPropertyValue('lang', lang) context.testCase.setPropertyValue('text', text)

con:request.name: LoopSpellingChecker
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang='${#TestCase#lang}' options="0" format=""> <spel:text>${#TestCase#text}</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: CheckCapitalWord_1
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="ru" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text> Игнорировать неверное употребление прописных и строчных букв, например, в слове "москва".</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: CheckCapitalWord_2
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="ru" options="0" format="">\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>Игнорировать неВерное употребление прописных и строчных букв, например, в слове "${Properties# answer_1}".</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: CheckCapitalWord_3
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="ru" options="0" format="">\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>Игнорировать ${Properties# answer_2} употребление ПРОПИСНЫХ и строчных букв, например, в слове "${Properties# answer_1}".</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: CheckCapitalIgnoreWord_1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="ru" options="512" format=""> <spel:text> Игнорировать неверное употребление ПРОПИСНЫХ и строчных букв, например, в слове "москва".</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script:
context.testCase.setPropertyValue('Text with hyperlink', 'Go to the link https://tech.yandex.ru/speller/doc/dg/reference') context.testCase.setPropertyValue('Text with numbers', 'And find on Page1 some info') context.testCase.setPropertyValue('Text with email', 'And sent me a letter to user@ya.com') context.testCase.setPropertyValue('Text with file name', 'With test777.txt file') context.testCase.setPropertyValue('Text with repeat', 'Look at the tree tree')
log.info("done")

con:request.name: CheckIgnoreOption0
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="En" options='0' format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with hyperlink}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with numbers}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with email}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with file name}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with repeat}</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: CheckErrorCount
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="En" options="526" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with hyperlink}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with numbers}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with email}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with file name}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#Text with repeat}</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:property.con:name: Text with numbers
con:property.con:value: And find on Page1 some info

con:property.con:name: Text with email
con:property.con:value: And sent me a letter to user@ya.com

con:request.name: CheckOption0
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="en" options="0" format=""> <spel:text>Repeat word word</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextRequest> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: CheckOption8
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="en" options="8" format="">\r <spel:text>Repeat word word</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: HintCountUK
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="UK" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>варенния</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: SOAP Request1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="uk" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>${Properties#hint1}</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="uk" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>${Properties#hint3}</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="uk" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>${Properties#hint4}</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: CheckAnswer
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextRequest lang="ru" options="0" format="">\r <spel:text>маршьрутка</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SOAP Request
con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="En" options='8' format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>london is is the cepital</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:config.script:
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context) def holder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder(context.Response) holder.namespaces['ns1'] = 'http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice'; def codeError1 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'london']/@code"] def codeError2 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'is']/@code"] def codeError3 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'cepital']/@code"]
log.info('codeError1 = ' + codeError1) log.info('codeError2 = ' + codeError2) log.info('codeError3 = ' + codeError3)
assert codeError1 == '3' assert codeError2 == '2' assert codeError3 == '1' log.info('All assertions passed')

con:request.name: CheckText
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="ru" options="0" format="">\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>В этом разделе соброны ссылки </spel:text> <spel:text>на интересные ришения стороних разработчиков, </spel:text> <spel:text>в которых используется API Яндекс.Спеллера.</spel:text>\r </spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script:
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context) def holder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder(context.Response) holder.namespaces['ns1'] = 'http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice';
def row1 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'соброны']/@row"] def col1 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'соброны']/@col"] def len1 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'соброны']/@len"]
def row2 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'ришения']/@row"] def col2 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'ришения']/@col"] def len2 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'ришения']/@len"]
def row3= holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'стороних']/@row"] def col3 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'стороних']/@col"] def len3 = holder["//ns1:SpellResult/ns1:error[.//ns1:word = 'стороних']/@len"]
log.info('соброны: row= ' + row1 + ' col= '+ col1 + ' len= ' + len1) log.info('ришения: row= ' + row2 + ' col= '+ col2 + ' len= ' + len2) log.info('стороних: row= ' + row3 + ' col= '+ col3 + ' len= ' + len3)
assert(row1 == '0' && col1 == '15' && len1 == '7') assert(row2 == '0' && col2 == '14' && len2 == '7') assert(row3 == '1' && col3 == '9' && len3 == '8')
log.info('All assertions passed')
